wxArray-like functions.
We cannot use wxArrayPtrVoid as base class (it does not have a virtual destructor) and so we are forced to re-implement the wxArray functions...

wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr
 The array of pointers to the wxKeyProfiles.

Detailed Description

An array of wxKeyProfiles.

This is an handy way to hold a set of pointers to wxKeyProfiles and to retrieve the profiles from a wxKeyConfigPanel after they have been added/removed/edited by the user.

void wxKeyProfileArray::AttachAllTo (  wxWindow *  w  )  [inline]
 

Attaches all the wxKeyProfiles to the given window.

Note:
This function should be used very carefully ! If all the keybinders are attached to the same window

void wxKeyProfileArray::Cleanup (   )  [inline]
 

Deletes all the objects of the array.

Unlike Clear() this function also deletes the objects and does not only detach them from this array.

Member Data Documentation

wxArrayPtrVoid wxKeyProfileArray::m_arr [private]
 

The array of pointers to the wxKeyProfiles.

Since this array hold pointers, instances of classes derived from wxKeyProfile can be used as well.
